description: Detects suspicious Plink tunnel remote forarding to a local port Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Administrative activity using a remote port forwarding to a local port
name: Suspicious Plink Remote Forwarding
query: (winlog.event_data.Description:"Command\-line\ SSH,\ Telnet,\ and\ Rlogin\ client" AND process.command_line:*\ \-R\ *)
